com.DizWARE.ShuffleTone
Class SwipeControls

java.lang.Object
  SimpleOnGestureListener
      com.DizWARE.ShuffleTone.SwipeControls

public class SwipeControls
extends SimpleOnGestureListener

This class handles a left and right swipe. In this case, it actually swipes between Shuffle Modes(Calls/SMS)

Author:
Tydiz
